Articles.Content:
Just something I threw together today while experimenting with the steam skin system

It replaces the top of your screen window with a ksp style border

To apply the skin, download it from here: https://www./?q6xiaiaxw9xiylu

Extract the folder 'ksp skin' and place it in

Program Files (x86) > Steam > skins

Now restart steam and go to settings. Under the tab labelled 'Interface' you should be able to select your skin.

If you have any suggestions, post them here and I'll see what I can do.

credit to Thesonicgalaxy's 'better atmospheres' for the planet textures, and obviously Squad for their logo
